pages.text: The $(item)Glorious Rite$() is the key to all glorious entities, as it permits the creation of $(marked)symbols$(). The incantation of the rite is created using the $(l:manipulation/entry_chaos)Chaos Rite$() on the $(l:manipulation/entry_time)Incantation of the Sun$().

In order to use the rite, a $(l:energy/entry_channeling)Channeling Tool$() must be bound to a $(l:glory/entry_stone_runed)Runed Stone$() with a pedestal on top. The pedestal must contain a specific item, which will determine the result of the rite. The runed stone must also be surrounded by $(item)Redstone$().

When the rite is performed, the Channeling Tool must be thrown near the Nexus. If the target is close enough, particles will appear.$(br)Considered that the rite is successful, it will end with the pedestal and the redstone disappearing, leaving a new block at the place of the runed stone.
